info.author: mrbug
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
This python script will download all of a YouTube user's uploads and then
optionally create a DVD.

It's purely for educational purposes as a proof-of-concept.

REQUIRES:
  * python 2.6
  * python-feedparser
  * python-gdata
  * kaa
  * youtube-dl
  * videotrans (currently -- may change)
info.keywords: download youtube dvd transcode vob video convert mp4 flv
info.name: dvdtube
info.summary: Supports automatic splitting of many videos into groups to fit onto more than one DVD5/DVD9.
info.html_description:
This python script will download all of a YouTube user’s uploads and then optionally create a DVD.

It’s purely for educational purposes as a proof-of-concept.

REQUIRES:
  • python 2.6
  • python-feedparser
  • python-gdata
  • kaa
  • youtube-dl
  • videotrans (currently – may change)
